issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Controls>Picker, I noticed while rotating the picker that the picker images were visible outside the grey frame of the picker as they passed by the bottom of the picker.  See attached image.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS (SDK 1.7.X) onto device
2) Navigate to Controls>Picker and choose any picker
3) Utilize the picker, rotating items by the bottom of the picker

Result:
Images bleed outside the bottom of the picker

Expected Result:
no images bleeding outside the picker.

Notes:
Occurs in 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Controls>Picker, all devices with all pickers have images appearing outside the picker frame while rotating picker.
fields.environment: Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.8) ,iPad (4.3) ,iPhone 3GS (3.1.2) ,iPod Touch 3rd Gen (4.0.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106011734, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X rc9515533

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer in use.
